name: Inject-O-Matic
author: twinpictures

sections.description: Inject-O-Matic is a WordPress plugin that allows users to inject custom jQuery and Javascript into the header and footer of a WordPress site.
sections.installation:
1. Old-school: upload the inject-o-matic folder to the /wp-content/plug-ins/ directory via FTP. Hipster: Ironically add Inject-O-Matic via the WordPress Plug-ins menu.
  2. Activate the Plug-in
  3. Test that the this plug-in meets your demanding needs.
  4. Rate the plug-in and verify if it works at wordpress.org.
  5. Leave a comment regarding bugs, feature request, cocktail recipes at https://wordpress.org/support/plugin/inject-o-matic
sections.faq:
I am a Social Netwookiee, might Twinpictures have a Facebook page?

Yes, yes… Twinpictures is on Facebook.

Does Twinpictures do the Twitter?

Ah yes! @Twinpictures does the twitter tweeting around here.

How does one use the plugin, exactly?

Add the custom script in the fields provided under the Dashboard > Settings > Inject-O-Matic. Save. View page. Dance a little jig of joy and joyfulness.

Where can I translate this plugin into my favourite language?

Community translation for Inject-O-Matic has been set up. All are welcome to join in the translation fun.

Who likes to rock the party?

We like to rock the party.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0

  • Added Inject for css and script links

0.2

  • Footer script now loads with a much lower priority

0.1

  • Where there was none, now there be one.

short_description: Inject custom jQuery/Javascript into the header and/or footer of a WordPress site.
description: Inject-O-Matic is a WordPress plugin that allows users to inject custom jQuery and Javascript into the header and footer of a WordPress site.
